STARTER_TEMPLATE_HERO_PRIMARY_TITLE: Explore the Flavors of the World
STARTER_TEMPLATE_HERO_SECONDARY_TITLE: Discover Delicious Recipes and Local Cuisines
NEWSLETTER_TITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Dish Out Deliciousness: Stay Looped In
TESTIMONIAL_SECTION_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER: Hear what delighted users have to say about our food app
TESTIMONIAL_1_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: This app is a game-changer for finding the best local eats! The reviews and ratings have led me to so many amazing hole-in-the-wall gems.
TESTIMONIAL_2_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: As someone with dietary restrictions, this app has made eating out so much easier. I can easily filter restaurants by my preferences.
TESTIMONIAL_3_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: The social features let me share my restaurant pics and see what my friends recommend. It's the ultimate foodie community!
FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Get the answers to your burning food-related questions
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_1: What types of foods does the app cover?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: Our app covers a wide variety of cuisines from around the world, including but not limited to American, Italian, Mexican, Indian, Chinese, and more. We strive to provide information and recipes for all tastes and dietary preferences.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_2: How can I find recipes for specific dietary restrictions?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: You can use our advanced search filters to find recipes that fit your dietary needs, whether you're looking for vegetarian, vegan, gluten-free, or any other specific requirements.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_3: Can I save my favorite recipes?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: Absolutely! Our app allows you to create a personalized recipe box where you can save and organize all of your favorite recipes for easy access and meal planning.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_4: Does the app provide nutritional information?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: Yes, we include detailed nutritional information for each recipe, including calorie count, macronutrient breakdown, and any potential allergens.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_5: Can I share recipes with friends and family?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: Of course! Our app has built-in social sharing features that allow you to easily share recipes with your loved ones via email, social media, or messaging apps.
STARTER_TEMPLATE_CALL_TO_ACTION_SUBTITLE: Explore our collection of mouthwatering recipes and find your next culinary adventure.
LANDING_PAGE_HERO_TEXT: Savor Every Flavor, Discover Every Dish
LANDING_PAGE_SUB_HERO_TEXT: Explore culinary delights, find recipes, and embark on a delectable journey with our food app.
STARTER_TEMPLATE_FOOTER_CONTENT: Discover new flavors, explore diverse cuisines, and embark on a delicious journey with FoodFinder. Your go-to app for all things food-related.
FEATURE_1_BODY: Explore a world of culinary delights with our extensive database of recipes from around the globe. Find your new favorite dish or rediscover a classic.
FEATURE_2_BODY: Our app learns your unique tastes and preferences, offering tailored suggestions that cater to your dietary needs and cravings.
FEATURE_3_BODY: Follow along with detailed, easy-to-understand instructions that walk you through each recipe, ensuring successful meals every time.
FEATURE_4_BODY: Streamline your weekly menu with our meal planning tools. Create shopping lists, adjust serving sizes, and save your favorite recipes for easy access.
FEATURE_5_BODY: Find recipes that fit your lifestyle with customizable filters for dietary restrictions, allergies, and preferences such as vegan, gluten-free, or low-carb.
FEATURE_6_BODY: Join a vibrant community of food enthusiasts. Share your creations, swap tips and tricks, and get inspired by fellow culinary adventurers.
CTA_BODY: Explore a world of mouthwatering recipes and find your new favorite dishes with our food app.
CTA_CONTENT_SUBTITLE: From international cuisines to healthy meals, we've got you covered.
HERO_SUBTITLE: Explore recipes, find restaurants, and indulge your cravings.
CONTACT_FORM_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Let us know how we can help make finding great food easier for you.

PLACEHOLDER_FAQ_TITLE: Frequently Asked Questions About Our Food App
ACCORDION_QUESTION_1: What kind of foods can I find on this app?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: Our app features a wide variety of cuisines and dishes from around the world. Whether you're craving Italian pasta, Mexican tacos, Indian curries, or classic American comfort foods, you'll find plenty of options to satisfy your cravings.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_2: How do I place an order?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: Placing an order is simple and intuitive. Just browse through the menu, select the items you want, customize any options, and proceed to checkout. You can pay securely online and have your order delivered right to your doorstep.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_3: Do you offer any dietary accommodations?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: Yes, we understand the importance of catering to different dietary needs and preferences. Our app allows you to filter menu items based on various dietary restrictions, such as vegetarian, vegan, gluten-free, or nut-free options.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_4: How can I track my order?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: After placing your order, you'll receive real-time updates on its status. You can track your order from preparation to delivery, ensuring you know exactly when to expect your delicious meal.
PAGE_DETAIL_1_VALUE: Explore a world of culinary delights with our app, where you can find mouth-watering recipes, local restaurants, and grocery deals.
PAGE_DETAIL_2_VALUE: Get tailored suggestions based on your dietary preferences, taste buds, and location, ensuring you never run out of tasty options.
PAGE_DETAIL_3_VALUE: Connect with fellow food lovers, share your favorite finds, and get inspired by the vibrant community of food enthusiasts.
